title: Ticket #7178: new materialization is not triggered when jobs begin to run
description:
When a job that is part of a late materialization cluster changes to run state, the cluster should materialize new jobs up to the max_idle limit. This isn't happening unless the transaction that commits the change of state of the job also changes the cluster ad (which doesn't usually happen).

In practice, new jobs only materialize when existing jobs in that cluster are removed from the queue, because job removal (completion) will change the cluster ad.
